metadata.description: A curated plugin marketplace for Claude Code containing development tools and productivity plugins specifically designed for FlowAccount developers.

plugins.name: ask-before-code
plugins.description: Encourages clarity before coding to prevent wasted work. Ask 3 questions now, save 3 hours later.

plugins.name: quick-wins
plugins.description: Identifies and guides easy code improvements. Small improvements, big impact.

plugins.name: md-to-skill
plugins.description: Continuous learning engine for Claude Code. Observes coding patterns, builds instincts from repeated behaviors, and evolves validated instincts into reusable skills. Also converts markdown into organized Claude skills.

plugins.name: local-memory
plugins.description: Automatically builds subdirectory CLAUDE.md context breadcrumbs using hybrid Hook + MCP architecture. Preserves module knowledge between sessions.

plugins.name: feature-sprint
plugins.description: Scope-driven feature development. Subagents for tiny/small/medium (fast). Agent Teams for large (analysts collaborate, implementers self-coordinate, reviewer auto-starts).
